title: adidas Men's Essentials Fleece Hoodie
description: Men's pullover hoodie for total comfort
REGULAR FIT: Not tight and not loose, the perfect in-between fit
DRAWCORD HOOD: Pull up the hood, cinch the cords and tune in to yourself
KANGAROO POCKET: Keep your hands warm

WE PARTNER WITH BETTER COTTON: The cotton in this product has been sourced through Better Cotton. Better Cotton is sourced via a chain of custody model called mass balance. This means that Better Cotton is not physically traceable to end products

There's no need to avoid the outdoors when it gets cool. Slip on this men's adidas hoodie for fleecy warmth when the sun slides behind the clouds. Tuck your hands into the kangaroo pocket when they need a quick warm up.
